code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec number_game(nums :: [integer]) :: [integer]
  def number_game(nums) do
    # Sort nums to facilitate the sequential removal of the smallest elements
    sorted_nums = Enum.sort(nums)
    # Initialize the resulting array
    arr = []
    # Process the game rounds until all elements are moved from nums to arr
    process_rounds(sorted_nums, arr)
  end

  defp process_rounds([], arr), do: arr

  defp process_rounds([_first, _second | _] = nums, arr) do
    # Extract the first two elements (the smallest ones due to sorting) for each round
    # Following the game's rules, simulate the actions of Alice and Bob
    [alice_min, bob_min | remaining_nums] = nums
    
    # Append to arr in the order of removal: first Bob's then Alice's
    new_arr = arr ++ [bob_min, alice_min]
    
    # Continue processing the remaining numbers
    process_rounds(remaining_nums, new_arr)
  end
end
